verbs.description: [ARG0: Pitcher Clay Buchholz] [V: has] [ARG1: Donald Trump in his corner and the Diamondbacks to thank for giving him a chance] .
Pitcher Clay Buchholz has Donald Trump in his corner and [ARG1: the Diamondbacks] to [V: thank] [ARG2: for giving him a chance] .
